long_description: Make the Alite Mayfly Chair part of any adventure that includes lounging. Lightweight and collapsible, it's easy to tote in your pack, or to backyard barbecues, summer concerts or campfire hangouts. Set the chair up with the optional front leg for a conventional chair experience; leave the front leg off to rock forward and back as you balance on the 2 back feet. Chair sets up quickly and easily using an aluminum hub and pole system similar to the design found in many lightweight tents. Lightweight nylon fabric features breathable mesh panels on the sides. Alite Mayfly Chair has a maximum capacity of 250 lbs. Packs down small and fits in the included stuff sack for easy storage and transportation; weighs only 1 lb. 4 oz.
